{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RT-AXE7800 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AXE7800 Tri Band Wi-Fi 6E Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AXE7800/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AXE7800/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AXE7800/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AXE7800 <!-- N.B. --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AXE7800 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AXE7800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAXE5H00 |icid = 3568A-RTAXE5H00 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6756;BCM6756KFEB6; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;<!-- MT29F2G01ABAGDWB-IT: G-->; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;<!-- MT41K256M16TW-107:P -->; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = MaxLinear;GPY211C0VC;MXL, GPY211, SLNW8; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134O; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 04:D9:F5 |oui = 04:D9:F5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6E, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, HE160, OFDMA, AiMesh, AiProtection, Open NAT |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Announced |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/14/2022 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 6 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad3ax = 4804 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[ASUS RT-AXE7800]] • AXE7800 Tri Band Gigabit Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXE5H00 (2022-07-14) • 12V/3A

*[[ASUS GT-AXE11000]] - ''ROG Rapture GT-AXE11000 Tri-band WiFi 6E Gaming Router'' <!-- && !defined(RTAXE95Q) && !defined(GTAXE11000) ? :6GHz band, 2.5G WAN/LAN port, PS5 compatible, WAN aggregation, VPN Fusion, Triple-level Game Acceleration, AiMesh --> :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJF00 (2020-08-04) 19V/3.33A *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] - ''ROG Rapture GT-AX11000 Tri-band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' • [https://rog.asus.com/networking/rog-rapture-gt-ax11000-model/ PPage]<!-- :10 Gigabit WiFi router, quad-core CPU, PS5 compatible, 2.5G port, DFS band, WTFast, Adaptive QoS, AiMesh --> :FCC ID: MSQ-RTHR00 (2018-02-15) • ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AX11000'' *[[ASUS GT-AX11000 Pro]] • AX11000 ROG Rapture Tri-Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX5C00 (2022-05-31) • 19V/3.42A
*[[ASUS RT-AXE7800]] • AXE7800 Tri Band Gigabit Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXE5H00 (2022-07-14) • 12V/3A *[[ASUS GT-AX6000 v2]] • AX6000 ROG Rapture Dual Band Gaming Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX5600 (2021-12-07) • [[ASUS GT-AX6000]] (NR) *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] (N/S) - ''ROG Rapture GT-AX6000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' • [https://github.com/blackfuel/asuswrt-rt-ac86u/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c GH] <!--ASUS GT-AX6000 - MODEL_GTAX6000, ASUS GT-AX6000N - MODEL_GTAX6000N, ASUS GT-AX6000S - MODEL_GTAX6000S QCA --> *[[ASUS RT-AX6000]] (AX6000) • AX6000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXHP00 (2018-02-14) • [[ASUS RT-AX88U]] *[[ASUS RT-AX5400]] (AX5400) • AX5400 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJG00 (2021-02-17) • [[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XD6)]] *[[ASUS TUF-AX5400]] • AX5400 TUF Gaming Dual Band WiFi 6 Router • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-tuf-ax5400.html Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX8D00 (2021-08-04) • [[Broadcom]] BCM6750/BCM43684 • [https://gnuton.github.io/asuswrt-merlin.ng/ GH] *[[ASUS GS-AX5400]] - ''ROG Strix GS-AX5400 Dual Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' <!-- :PS5 compatible, Mobile Game Mode, VPN Fusion, Instant Guard, Gear Accelerator, Gaming Port, Adaptive QoS, ASUS Aura RGB --> *[[ASUS GS-AX3000]] - ''ROG Strix GS-AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' <!-- :PS5 compatible, Mobile Game Mode, VPN Fusion, Instant Guard, Gear Accelerator, Gaming Port, Adaptive QoS, ASUS Aura RGB -->
*[[ASUS TUF-AX3000]] - ''TUF Gaming AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' • [https://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201910/01/185220oat3zobtpvbhm2oo.jpg PCB] :*[[ASUS RT-AX3000]] • [[BCM]] (HND-963178_BASE)/96750GW *[[ASUS TUF-AX3000 v2]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM6756 • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-tuf-ax3000-v2.html Review] :*[[ASUS RT-AX3000 v2]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM6756 • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-rt-ax58u-v2.html Review] ::FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX5000 (2022-01-31) • [[ASUS RT-AX58U v2]] *[[ASUS RT-AX58U]] • [[BCM]] (HND-963178_BASE)/96750GW • [https://www.noticiasdeinformatica.net/router-asus-rt-ax58u-ax3000/ Review] :*[[ASUS RT-AX58U v2]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM6756 • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-rt-ax58u-v2.html Reviews] ::FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX5000 (2022-01-31) • [[ASUS RT-AX3000 v2]]
